body: It seems like this is the new trend, again and I haven't done one of these in a while. Also seeing the 2015 is over in only about 2 or so weeks, so AMA!

replies.body: Where do you live? Is your real name Alex? Favourite food? Favourite animal? Favourite fruit? Favourite drink? Favourite colour? Favourite Avicus map? Opinions on me? Why is your build server so popular? Why did you give Merp Admin?

Pennsylvania.
Alexander, Alex for short. 
Pizza.

You are a very cool person, you're very fun to talk with and you just have an awesome personality in general.
